statements: SELECT * FROM customer_credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM customer_credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customer_credit_card_transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_credit_card_transactions WHERE customer_id IN (1, 5, 7) AND transaction_amount < 50;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_description FROM customer_credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_description LIKE '%food%';
SELECT * FROM customer_credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount FROM customer_credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM customer_credit_card_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_description FROM customer_credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_credit_card_transactions WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND transaction_description LIKE '%shopping%' ORDER BY customer_id, transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM CreditCardTransactions
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM CreditCardTransactions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT customer_id, card_number FROM CreditCardTransactions WHERE transaction_amount > 500
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM CreditCardTransactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM FraudulentTransactions WHERE flag = TRUE
SELECT * FROM CreditCardTransactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, card_number FROM CreditCardTransactions WHERE customer_id = '6a4e6354-7d49-4960-b5ca-2f76e41ee331'
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM CreditCardTransactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT transaction_id, reason FROM FraudulentTransactions WHERE flag = TRUE
SELECT * FROM FraudulentTransactions WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY report_date ASC
SELECT * FROM CustomerTransactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM CustomerTransactions;
SELECT customer_id, credit_card_number FROM CustomerTransactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerDetails;
SELECT * FROM CustomerTransactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerTransactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM CustomerTransactions WHERE customer_id = 12345 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM FraudulentTransactions JOIN CustomerDetails ON FraudulentTransactions.transaction_id = CustomerDetails.customer_id WHERE fraud_reason LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY fraud_detection_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM CustomerTransactions WHERE transaction_amount > 500) ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_transaction_amount FROM CustomerTransactions;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM customer_transactions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT customer_id, timestamp FROM transaction_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_details WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM customer_transactions WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer_details WHERE phone LIKE '%123%' OR email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM transaction_history WHERE status = 'failed' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, flagged FROM fraud_detection WHERE flagged = true;

SELECT * FROM customer_transactions JOIN customer_details ON customer_transactions.customer_id = customer_details.customer_id WHERE customer_details.name = 'Alice' ORDER BY customer_transactions.timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT card_number, expiry_date FROM credit_cards ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT pattern_description FROM fraud_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 3;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT card_number, customer_id, expiry_date FROM credit_cards WHERE expiry_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_patterns WHERE pattern_description ILIKE '%fraudulent%';

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.timestamp, fp.pattern_description FROM transactions t JOIN fraud_transactions ft ON t.transaction_id = ft.transaction_id JOIN fraud_patterns fp ON ft.pattern_id = fp.pattern_id;
